Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Ace 2x
Reviews.Author: Ann Martin
Reviews.Content: This is a very good, effective, reasonable phone that met my expectation. I would recommend this phone to other buyers

Reviews.Title: Very Slow
Reviews.Author: Magaly Dishmey Gabino
Reviews.Content: Good morning:Buy this phone and I have just one week using it and is very slow, even though I've only downloaded 2 applications facebook and whatsapp, takes much longer to make a call, really slow.I know that no solution for this situation, because this phone is very expensive to do that.regardsMagaly Dishmey

Reviews.Title: phone arrived on time and just as described.
Reviews.Author: Customer
Reviews.Content: phone arrived on time and just as described. love this phone. its unlocked a comes with original packaging. recently purchased an unlocked Galaxy SII and came with missing earpiece, etc  and phone looked like refurb.
